_header: When me bethought is of my lady dear

BLHar682.First Lines:
WHen me bithought is of my ladi dereThe bewte shappe and goodli
                    gouernaunce…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…Hit both for ioy myn hert to synge and daunceThat even a
                    blisse me thynke is him to here
BLHar682.Note: As written, repeats first words of lines 1-2 at end to indicate going back to first four lines of the roundel.
